pullRequest.title: feat: latest and earliest ByOffset UDFs to capture N values
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Extend latest_by_offset by accepting a parameter n which would then give you the latest n entries by a key as an array. This is also the same for earliest.
Testing done
Unit tests and functional tests updated
Reviewer checklist

 Ensure docs are updated if necessary. (eg. if a user visible feature is being added or changed).
 Ensure relevant issues are linked (description should include text like "Fixes #")

nodes.bodyText:
Would you mind backing out formatting changes such as this. It causes unnecessary churn in the code base, (making merges and diffs harder) and adds unnecessary code changes that need reviewing. Thanks.
(I think some of these formatting changes may also make the build fail!)
I'll take other formatting changes in the PR that should be backed out to with 'revert formatting please'

revert formatting please
nit: can be private.
nit: can be private.

Can I request two changes to each of these new methods please?

Can we make these new methods plural, please? e.g. earliestIntegers given they return multiple. (The method name can be logged in some places and this will help differentiate from the existing method).
Can we rename the parameter topNSize to something like earliestN?. (The parameter is output during a DESCRIBE of the function and this name is more intuitive.  topNSize suggests functionality akin to TOPK method, which this is not).


  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              public static Udaf<Integer, List<Struct>, List<Integer>> earliestInteger(final int topNSize) {
          
          
            
              public static Udaf<Integer, List<Struct>, List<Integer>> earliestIntegers(final int earliestN) {
          
      
    
    
  

Can you make the same changes to each of the methods in this class and LatestByOffset please, (obviously changing the param to latestN.
Not required - this line can be deleted. This is not a UDAF factory. (The function above you copied is wrong too in case you were wondering).

nodes.bodyText: Same changes to the new functions in this file, as were done to the ones in EarliestByOffset, i.e. plural method names and param names changes to latestN.
Please make corresponding changes to this code, as were suggested for the EarliestByOffset code.
FYI: Just Arrays.asList needed. No need for the new ArrayList<>( bit.
Consider changing the value of earlestN, so not all tests use 2.  Alternate between 1, 2 & 3, maybe?
Apply same changes to this file as were made to the EarliestByOffsetTest file.

commit.message: Added explicit paramSchema in @UdafFactory annotation for latestbyoffset udaf
Removed paramSchema as that had no effect on UDFIndex
Updated unit tests and functional tests for LatestByOffset and EarliestByOffset
Fixed tests according to PR review comments

beforeCommit.message: Updated unit tests and functional tests for LatestByOffset and EarliestByOffset

afterCommit.message: Fixed tests according to PR review comments
